SummaryEnglish: The Pokémon world has a wide variety of regions filled with interesting people and wonderful Pokémon. Pokémon Evolutions, a new, limited animated series, will take you on a tour of the regions that have been explored in the core Pokémon video game series.
Aliases: ポケモンエボリューションズ

1.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 1: The Champion
1.SummaryEnglish:
What feelings lie within the heart of a Champion? 

Revisit Leon’s intense battle with Eternatus in this behind-the-scenes comparison from Pokémon Evolutions Episode 1!

2.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 2: The Eclipse
2.SummaryEnglish: Dive back into Alola by revising the fierce battle with Necrozma in this behind-the-scenes peek from Pokémon Evolutions Episode 2!

3.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 3: The Visionary
3.SummaryEnglish: Jump back into Kalos and look beyond Lysandre’s vision with this behind-the-scenes peek from Pokémon Evolutions episode 3!

4.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 4: The Plan
4.SummaryEnglish: Discover what Ghetsis has in store for Unova in this behind-the-scenes look from episode 4 of Pokémon Evolutions!

5.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 5: The Rival
5.SummaryEnglish:
Get ready world—Barry’s on the move! 

Revisit Barry’s journey through the Sinnoh region in this behind-the-scenes look into Pokémon Evolutions Episode 5, The Rival!

6.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 6: The Wish
6.SummaryEnglish:
Does Zinnia have what it takes to fulfill her duty?

Travel back to the Hoenn region to revisit lore and legend in this behind-the-scenes look from Pokémon Evolutions episode 6!

7.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 7: The Show
7.SummaryEnglish:
The Kimono Girls return to the stage!

The spotlight is on Johto as we journey back to the historic region in this behind-the-scenes performance from Pokémon Evolutions episode 7!

8.TitleEnglish: Behind the Scenes of Pokémon Evolutions Ep 8: The Discovery
8.SummaryEnglish:
The race is on to catch the ever-elusive Mewtwo!

Revisit Kanto as Green joins the chase to find the powerful Pokémon in a behind-the-scenes look from Pokémon Evolutions episode 8!

1.SummaryEnglish: What goes on within the heart of a Champion? Doubts? Regrets? Determination? Maybe all three?

2.SummaryEnglish: With a dash of determination and courage, Lillie vows to rescue her mother and bring back her friend Nebby! But be strong, Lillie—there seems to be a sinister presence on the horizon…

3.SummaryEnglish: When chasing your dream, do you give up when everyone tells you it’s wrong? Should you listen? Or do you continue to follow your vision, even if it puts all of Kalos at risk? For Lysandre, that’s never been a question…

4.SummaryEnglish: He thought of everything as he plotted and schemed behind the scenes. He manipulated people and Pokémon as each piece of his plan for Unova fell into place exactly as intended.

5.SummaryEnglish: Rivals. No matter how fast you run through Sinnoh, they’re always one step ahead, driving you to be better. But at some point, whoever they are, you must stop to face them and their Pokémon.

6.SummaryEnglish: All her life, she’s been told the story of her people, bound to their wishes and to her duty to Hoenn. Lorekeeper Zinnia has always known what she has to do…but when the Legendary Pokémon Rayquaza arrives, will she have what it takes?

7.SummaryEnglish: We raise the curtain on the Kimono Girls as they perform a tale of the Legendary Pokémon of Johto in a magical storytelling experience you’ll never forget!

8.SummaryEnglish: Did you hear the rumor? What might be the most powerful Pokémon ever has been discovered in Kanto! Green has begun her search for this elusive Pokémon...but she’s not the only one racing to catch it!
